name: tm26
effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.
